featureTag.custom: Custom model, the default settings support both function calls and visual recognition. Please verify the availability of the above capabilities based on actual conditions.
featureTag.file: This model supports file upload for reading and recognition.
featureTag.tokens: This model supports a maximum of {{tokens}} tokens per session.

ModelSelect.removed: This model is not in the list. If unchecked, it will be automatically removed.

apiKey.proxyDocs: Not sure how to apply for an API Key?
apiKey.startDesc: Enter your OpenAI API Key to start the conversation. The application will not record your API Key.

clear.alert: Are you sure you want to delete the history messages?
clear.tip: This action is irreversible, please proceed with caution

delSessionAlert: Are you sure you want to delete this conversation? Once deleted, it cannot be recovered, so please proceed with caution!

enableHistoryCount.setlimited: Set the number of historical messages
enableHistoryCount.title: Limit Historical Message Count

input.alert: Please remember: Everything said by the AI is generated by AI.
input.placeholder: Please enter content to start chatting

noDanceList: No playlist available. You can subscribe to your favorite dances through the market.
noSession: No sessions available. You can create a custom role by clicking +, or add roles through the discovery page.

token.useToken: Calculation of Token Consumption, including messages, character settings, and context: {{usedTokens}} / {{maxValue}}
